cancelRequestModal.cancelMentoringReques:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the cancel mentoring request confirmation modal.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session Request page → Cancel Request modal (header).
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks to cancel a mentoring request and the confirmation modal opens.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Cancel mentoring request?"
cancelRequestModal.areYouSure:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative text asking for confirmation to cancel a mentoring request.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session Request page → Cancel Request modal (body paragraph).
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks to cancel a mentoring request and the confirmation modal opens.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to cancel this mentoring request? Please note that if someone has started giving feedback in the last few minutes, the session may continue regardless of this cancellation."
cancelRequestModal.cancelMentoringReques:
**Functional Purpose**: Action button to confirm the cancellation of a mentoring request.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session Request page → Cancel Request modal (primary button).
**When Users See This**: On the Cancel Request confirmation modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Cancel mentoring request"
cancelRequestModal.close:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the cancel mentoring request modal without taking action.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session Request page → Cancel Request modal (secondary button).
**When Users See This**: On the Cancel Request confirmation modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Close"
cancelRequestButton.cancelRequest:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate the cancellation of a mentoring request.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session Request page (button next to the request details).
**When Users See This**: When a user views a pending mentoring request.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Cancel Request"
